title: Pre-news systems become mainstream
description: The most important decisions made by governments, research labs, courts, and companies leave faint impressions long before anyone talks about them. In 2026, those impressions turn into visible signals. Newsrooms gain the tools to detect them, interpret them, and prepare coverage before institutions set the narrative. These signals appear in places that rarely draw attention...
